Package edu.monash.fit2099.game.interfaces

Interface HigherGround

All Known Implementing Classes:
Mature, Sapling, Sprout, Tree, Wall
public interface HigherGround
This interface handles the interaction player has with higher grounds in the map of the edu.monash.fit2099.game

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    default MoveActorAction getMovementAction​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction, double success_rate, int damage)
    This method checks if the actor possesses any magical items and accounts for their effects on its jumping capabilities while also adding the jump option to the allowableActionsList
    java.lang.String getName()  

  • Method Details

    • getName

      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      String to get name of the Tree Cycle Stage

    • getMovementAction

      default MoveActorAction getMovementAction​(Actor actor, Location location, java.lang.String direction, double success_rate, int damage)
      This method checks if the actor possesses any magical items and accounts for their effects on its jumping capabilities while also adding the jump option to the allowableActionsList
      Parameters:
      actor - Actor who might be performing a certain action
      location - Location of the ground
      direction - actor needs to jump on the higher ground at a certain direction
      success_rate - of making jump to a particular higher ground
      damage - Damage dealt when jump to higher ground fails
      Returns:
      An instance of MoveActorAction
